page.title: 06G.P.O./POLICE (OAKENGATES)
page.content:
The Postal Sorting Office. __________________________ Mr. Onions is in charge of 29 postmen who deliver to:Oakengates, Town Centre, Trench, Donnington, Muxton, Redhill and Priorslee. Although the building is new and large they have no machines to sort the mail. This is still done by hand.
Oakengates Police Station. __________________________ It was built in 1957. 10 police officers and 4 C.I.D. officers work there. There are about 150 crimes committed each month. Theft is the crime that they deal with most. They get about 6 emergency calls each day. However most of the work is paper -work. The building has a kennel for stray dogs and a redundant prison cell.
